AI Action场景:
Update Deal Stage
Update Contact
Log Activity
必需数据字段:
• Deal ID / Contact ID
• Current Stage
• Target Stage
• Pipeline Options
数据来源/API:
• GET /deals/:id 获取当前状态
• GET /pipelines 获取 Stage 枚举
• PATCH /deals/:id 更新 Stage
• Context: Agent 需识别 Deal 名称并匹配 ID

AI Action场景:
Batch Create/Update Contact
Batch Create/Update Companies
Add Contact to List
Create Workflow
Create Associations
必需数据字段:
• Contact Properties (Email, Name, Phone, etc.)
• Company Properties
• List ID
• Workflow Name
• Association Type
数据来源/API:
• POST /contacts/batch/create 批量创建联系人
• POST /contacts/batch/update 批量更新联系人
• POST /companies/batch/upsert 批量创建/更新公司
• POST /lists/:id/add 添加联系人到列表
• POST /workflows 创建工作流
• POST /associations 创建关联关系
• Context: Agent 需处理批量数据并验证格式

AI Action场景:
Update Opportunity
Change Lead Status
必需数据字段:
• Opportunity ID
• Current Stage
• Target Stage
数据来源/API:
• GET /sobjects/Opportunity/:id
• PATCH /sobjects/Opportunity/:id
• Stage 枚举来自 Salesforce Schema

AI Action场景:
Status Change
Assignee Update
Priority Change
必需数据字段:
• Issue ID
• Current Status
• Target Status
• Assignee List
• Priority Options
数据来源/API:
• GET /issue/:id 获取当前状态
• GET /team/:id/states 获取 Status 枚举
• GET /team/:id/members 获取成员列表
• PATCH /issue/:id 更新状态

AI Action场景:
Create Issue
Add Comment
Add Attachment
Delete Issue
必需数据字段:
• Project ID
• Issue Title
• Issue Description
• Assignee (optional)
• Priority (optional)
• Comment Text / Attachment File
数据来源/API:
• POST /issue 创建 Issue
• POST /issue/:id/comments 添加评论
• POST /issue/:id/attachments 添加附件
• DELETE /issue/:id 删除 Issue
• Context: Agent 需从对话提取 Issue 信息

AI Action场景:
Status Transition
Assignee Update
Priority Change
必需数据字段:
• Issue Key
• Current Status
• Target Status
• Transition ID
• User List
数据来源/API:
• GET /issue/:key
• GET /issue/:key/transitions 获取可用转换
• GET /user/search 搜索用户
• POST /issue/:key/transitions

AI Action场景:
Create Issue
Add Comment
Add Attachment
Delete Issue
Create/Delete Project
必需数据字段:
• Project Key
• Issue Type
• Summary
• Description
• Assignee (optional)
• Comment Text / Attachment File
数据来源/API:
• POST /issue 创建 Issue
• POST /issue/:key/comment 添加评论
• POST /issue/:key/attachments 添加附件
• DELETE /issue/:key 删除 Issue

AI Action场景:
Send Message
Update Message
Reply in Thread
必需数据字段:
• Channel ID / DM ID
• Message Text
• Thread TS (for replies)
• User/Channel List
• Workspace metadata
数据来源/API:
• GET /conversations.list 获取频道列表
• GET /users.list 获取用户列表（含 display name, email, role）
• POST /chat.postMessage 发送消息
• Context: Agent 需从对话历史获取 Channel 名称和 Thread context
• 用户通过 display name 或 email 识别

AI Action场景:
Send Message
Reply to Thread
Send to Channel
必需数据字段:
• Channel ID / Chat ID
• Message Text
• Thread ID (for replies)
• User List (from org directory)
• Team metadata
数据来源/API:
• GET /teams 获取团队列表
• GET /users 获取组织用户列表（含 display name, email, department）
• POST /chats/messages 发送消息
• Context: Agent 需从对话识别收件人并匹配组织目录

AI Action场景:
Send Message
Send to Contact
Send to Group
必需数据字段:
• Contact Name
• Phone Number
• Message Text
• Contact ID (optional)
• Group ID (optional)
数据来源/API:
• GET /contacts 获取联系人列表
• GET /contacts/search 搜索联系人（按名称/号码）
• POST /messages 发送消息
• Context: Agent 需从对话识别收件人名称并匹配电话号码
• 仅有电话号码和用户名，无 workspace metadata
• 支持用户编辑/修正联系人信息

AI Action场景:
Send Message
Send to Chat
Send to Channel
必需数据字段:
• Chat ID / Channel ID
• Username
• Phone Number (optional)
• Message Text
• Contact List
数据来源/API:
• GET /getMe 验证 Bot 状态
• GET /getUpdates 获取聊天列表
• POST /sendMessage 发送消息
• Context: Agent 需从对话识别收件人并匹配 Username/Chat ID
• 仅有 Username 和 Phone Number，无组织架构信息
• 支持检索和编辑联系人信息

AI Action场景:
Create Event
Update Event
Send Invite
必需数据字段:
• Event Title
• Start/End Time
• Attendees List
• Calendar ID
• Description
数据来源/API:
• GET /calendars 获取日历列表
• POST /calendars/:id/events 创建事件
• Agent 需从对话提取时间、参与者信息

AI Action场景:
Draft Email
Send Email
Reply to Thread
必需数据字段:
• To (Email Address)
• Subject
• Email Body
• Thread ID (for replies)
• Attachments (optional)
数据来源/API:
• GET /messages/:id 获取原邮件（回复时）
• POST /messages/send 发送邮件
• GET /contacts 获取联系人（支持搜索）
• Context: Agent 需从对话识别收件人名称并补全邮箱

AI Action场景:
Draft Email
Send Email
必需数据字段:
• To (Email Address)
• Subject
• Email Body
• CC/BCC (optional)
数据来源/API:
• GET /me/contacts 获取联系人
• POST /me/sendMail 发送邮件
• GET /me/messages/:id 获取邮件

AI Action场景:
Create Campaign
Send Campaign
Schedule Campaign
必需数据字段:
• Campaign Name
• Subject Line
• Email Content (HTML)
• Audience/List ID
• Send Time (optional)
数据来源/API:
• GET /lists 获取受众列表
• POST /campaigns 创建 Campaign
• POST /campaigns/:id/actions/send 发送
• Agent 需从指令提取 Campaign 内容和目标受众

AI Action场景:
Send Marketing Email
Create Template

• From Email
• To List
• Subject
• HTML Content

数据来源/API:

• POST /mail/send 发送邮件

AI Action场景:
Create Survey
Send Survey
Distribute Survey
必需数据字段:
• Survey Title
• Questions
• Recipient List
• Survey Link
• Distribution Method
数据来源/API:
• POST /forms 创建表单
• GET /forms/:id 获取表单链接
• 需集成邮件 API 进行分发
• Agent 需从指令生成问卷问题结构

AI Action场景:
Create Survey
Send Collector
必需数据字段:
• Survey Title
• Questions
• Collector Type
• Recipient Emails
数据来源/API:
• POST /surveys 创建调研
• POST /surveys/:id/collectors 创建收集器
• POST /collectors/:id/messages 发送邀请

AI Action场景:
Create Page
Update Page
Add Comment
必需数据字段:
• Space ID
• Page ID (更新时)
• Page Title
• Content (HTML/Storage Format)
• Parent Page ID
数据来源/API:
• GET /spaces 获取空间列表
• GET /content 搜索页面
• POST /content 创建页面
• PUT /content/:id 更新页面
• Agent 需从对话识别要更新的页面标题

AI Action场景:
Create Doc
Update Doc Content
Insert Text
必需数据字段:
• Document ID (更新时)
• Document Title
• Content Text
• Insert Position
• Folder ID (创建时)
数据来源/API:
• POST /documents 创建文档
• POST /documents/:id:batchUpdate 批量更新
• GET /documents/:id 获取文档内容
• GET /drive/files 搜索文档

AI Action场景:
Generate Campaign Report
Generate Audience Analytics
Export Performance Data
必需数据字段:
• Campaign ID (optional)
• Date Range (Start/End)
• Report Metrics (Opens, Clicks, etc.)
• Report Format (Summary/Detailed)
• Audience Segment ID (optional)
数据来源/API:
• GET /reports/campaigns/:id 获取单个 Campaign 报告
• GET /reports 获取所有 Campaign 报告
• GET /lists/:id/growth-history 获取受众增长数据
• GET /lists/:id/activity 获取活动数据
• Context: Agent 分析数据并生成可读性报告
• AI 生成图表说明和洞察建议

AI Action场景:
Generate Sales Report
Pipeline Analytics
Revenue Forecast
必需数据字段:
• Date Range (Start/End)
• Pipeline ID
• Report Type (Deals/Revenue/Forecast)
• Team/Owner Filter
• Grouping Options (Stage/Month)
数据来源/API:
• GET /crm/v3/objects/deals 获取 Deals 数据
• GET /analytics/v2/reports 获取分析报告
• GET /crm/v3/pipelines/deals 获取 Pipeline 配置
• GET /owners 获取所有者列表
• Context: Agent 需计算转化率、预测趋势
• AI 生成执行摘要和行动建议

AI Action场景:
Generate Traffic Report
User Behavior Analysis
Conversion Report
必需数据字段:
• Date Range (Start/End)
• Property ID
• Metrics (Sessions, Users, Conversions)
• Dimensions (Source, Device, Page)
• Segment Filter (optional)
数据来源/API:
• POST /data:runReport 运行自定义报告
• GET /properties 获取属性列表
• GET /metadata 获取可用维度和指标
• Context: Agent 需理解分析目标并选择合适指标
• AI 生成趋势分析和优化建议

AI Action场景:
Generate Pipeline Report
Forecast Report
Team Performance
必需数据字段:
• Date Range (Start/End)
• Report Type ID (optional)
• Opportunity Stage Filter
• User/Team Filter
• Include Forecast (Yes/No)
数据来源/API:
• GET /analytics/reports 获取报告列表
• POST /analytics/reports/:id/instances 运行报告
• GET /sobjects/Opportunity/describe 获取字段元数据
• GET /sobjects/User 获取用户列表
• Context: Agent 需整合多个数据源
• AI 生成业绩洞察和预测分析

Create Meeting

AI Action场景:
Create Issue
Create Branch
Create Pull Request
Create/Update File
Add Comment
Create Repository
Create Workflow Dispatch
必需数据字段:
• Repository Name
• Issue Title/Body
• Branch Name
• PR Title/Body
• File Path/Content
• Comment Text
• Workflow Name
数据来源/API:
• POST /repos/:owner/:repo/issues 创建 Issue
• POST /repos/:owner/:repo/git/refs 创建分支
• POST /repos/:owner/:repo/pulls 创建 PR
• PUT /repos/:owner/:repo/contents/:path 创建/更新文件
• POST /repos/:owner/:repo/issues/:number/comments 添加评论
• POST /user/repos 创建仓库
• POST /repos/:owner/:repo/actions/workflows/:id/dispatches 触发工作流
• Context: Agent 需识别仓库和分支信息
